author: CMS-HGCAL
body:
Use more meaningfull cell types from enums in `HGCSiliconDetId` and `HGCScintillatorDetId`, instead of magic number.

(Cell type was not yet used by the HGCal Raw-Data DPG, but we'll need it to correctly map calibrations of RecHits.)
title: [HGCAL] Fix cell types in indexer
